reviewText: Great fun but also very educational as these two knowledgable men discuss and debate the policies of Jefferson and Hamilton.  I am hoping there will be a third debate soon

The Rematch! was a powerful follow up to the first Great Debate dvd. Definitely worth the wait!
I have said before, and will continue to say that these two dvds should be required study for every high school student in America!
Thank you, Bill Chrystal and Clay Jenkinson for the enormous effort that you put forth on behalf of We The People.
